questions.name: Originality
questions.title: Originality
questions.description_0: 0->This is a copy of a counterfeit
questions.description_10: 10->I have never heard anything like this

questions.name: Lyrics
questions.title: Lyrics
questions.description_0: 0->Someone shredded a book and is singing what came out / Only knows one word

questions.name: Rhythm
questions.title: Rhythm
questions.description_0: 0->Sounds like a box of maracas fell down
questions.description_10: 10->The grandma, who can't walk, got up to dance

questions.name: Costume
questions.title: Costume
questions.description_0: 0->The emperor in his birthday suit was better dressed
questions.description_10: 10->I've never seen anything like this, and I love it

questions.name: Set Design
questions.title: Set Design
questions.description_0: 0->As usual, it's empty and they put on fireworks
questions.description_10: 10->It's so well put together it looks like a music video

questions.name: Performance
questions.title: Performance
questions.description_0: 0->I didn't come to watch a school recital
questions.description_10: 10->You can tell the hours of preparation. Amazing

questions.name: Cultural
questions.title: Cultural Coherence
questions.description_0: 0->With this song, I don't know which country you're from

questions.name: Emotional
questions.title: Emotional Connection
questions.description_0: 0->It's the plain white rice of music

questions.name: General
questions.title: General
questions.description_0: 0->While I'm rating it, I've already forgotten the song
questions.description_10: 10->It will go down in the history of the contest
